website_summaries.verdict: Compact cleaning kit that includes an interior and exterior cleaner and towels.
pros: Includes a UV protector for your vinyl seats
Interior spray also works on carpets
cons: These 18 ounce bottles do not provide much product for the cost

website_summaries.verdict: Effective cleaner on all types of maritime surfaces.
pros: Customers note not just the deep cleanse, but the shiny finish as well
Noted for its ease of use
your boat could be fully cleaned quickly and efficiently
Great for cleaning a boat after a long period in storage
cons: Some customers note the bottle leaked upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my wildest dreams. Used on a 37 year old Sea Ray. Seats went from looking ok but dirty to beautifully clean in minutes. Hardly had to rub at all. This cleans deep into the cracks and groves. Removed years of grim off in minutes. Took off some stains I could not believe came off. Well worth the money, so pleased I purchased the gal size to finish the interior. The cloths in this kit are fantastic, wish they were available to purchase separately. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Cattle Queen

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable product for boat cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I thought something with "juice" in the name would be gimmicky. I was wrong. This stuff is amazing. It cleans and protects like nobody's business. And, on top of that, it does it with an amazingly fresh scent - almost sweet smelling. Every time I use this stuff, it's a real pleasure. Also, the cleaning pads that came with it are very soft and make wiping off the cleaners a real dream. Nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Filias

customer_reviews.title: Really like the simplicy of use and quality
customer_reviews.text: I now keep this on the boat and the very soft microfiber cloths that come with it are perfect. They are color coded cloths to the interior and the exterior product and so easy to use and store in the boat together without mixing them up. Both work well as I have used these two weekends in a row - cleans all surfaces well. A little strong odor coming from the products that I could live without but otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and definitely adds some protection
customer_reviews.text: So far I've mainly used this on the outside of the boat and a little on the inside. We have tried to keep our boat pretty clean so there weren't a huge amount of water spots but this stuff went on super easy and you can tell that it leaves a nice coating when complete. I'm curious to see how well it sheds water over time and perhaps helps to prevent and small scuffing from fenders or docks. Love the smooth wax feel after applying. A pleasure to use and we'll continue throughout the summer.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Best boat products EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The interior cleaner with UV protection was simply AMAZING! It cleaned my seats with just one application after my boat had sat dormant since 2013! I had tried glass cleaner, Lysol and Scrubbing bubbles, none of them got in deep like the Boat Juice that my brother gave me to try, it is a miracle product! Will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Need some elbow grease to get the water stains out the first time, but it definitely makes cleanup after applied way easier. Second and third passes new water stains come right off with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Best Boat Detailing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Owned boats for years and always in search of great detailing products. Read reviews from others on Boat Juice and finally spent the extra money and tried both the interior and exterior products. I will never buy another brand as these products are the best of the best. The shine and coating it applies to your gel coat make the boat look brand new! Take care of your boat & PWC with this product and you'll never buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t think of a better product for water spots
customer_reviews.text: The products work great on my seadoo jetskis and easily made hard water spots vanish. I didn’t see it as being greasy as others commented. The two enclosed microfiber cloths work well too. They’re very thick. The scent is honestly really pleasant and makes you forget you’re cleaning. The bottles are large and seemingly goes along ways.
customer_reviews.author: A. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smell like vinegar either
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. Tried it I stead of the hot sauce. It leaves the boat looking fabulous and spot free. It doesn't smell like vinegar either. The aroma is actually quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: K&K Friz

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far and it worked great on my vinyl, glass and gel coat. Smells great too. Once I run low I plan on ordering a few of the gallon jugs and refill these bottles. The microfiber towels that come with this kit are some of the best quality I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalBen33

customer_reviews.title: Smells good enough to eat
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a product to remove mineral stains along the hull of our boat & was impressed with the great reviews for Boat Juice. We were not disappointed! The microfiber towels, along with the product & a little elbow grease worked wonders in restoring shine. It removed quite a bit of rust (will probably need something more acidic to take it all off). Also removed black spots from the trailer rollers. The scent is absolutely amazing! Both the pina colada & creamsicle transport you to a tropical paradise, making the job of cleaning a little more enjoyable. The interior solution really gave added sparkle to the vinyl. Won’t hesitate to purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I tried the Meguiars Marine/RV spot remover and it worked ok. The Meguiars required a little more elbow grease to get it clean and was even harder to do if the surface is hot. This stuff works great, just using the towels it came with. I've cleaned my boat when the surface is hot and cool to the touch and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and it’s my new go-to for cleaning our 23 foot pontoon. The exterior spray does a good job with water spots and the interior spray shines and preserves. The smell is nice and the microfiber towels that come with both bottles are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Envoy30

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: The product disappointed me. I've used many waxes and was hoping that boat juice would be a quick an easy way to clean the boat after a day at the lake. I had to buff twice as long and the finish had a haze that I couldnt remove until I rewaxed the boat with a good marine wax. Maybe I had a bad batch. I had heard amazing things about this product but I just didnt feel the same as the other boat juice fans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Gator Step flooring
customer_reviews.text: Love the interior and works well to clean our Gator Step flooring. The smell is great and makes the whole boat smell nice. I like the microfiber towels and the exterior smell. The exterior works well if the boat is already wet and works on the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Evans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Boat Juice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product looking for a quality cleaner that would protect the vinyl on our boat. It had been quite awhile since I had cleaned the vinyl so it was pretty dirty. Boat juice worked amazing! One treatment and it was clean as well as protected by the sun. Now I treat it once a month. I also used the exterior boat juice and love that as well. The micro cloths that came with the kit are awesome as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced.
customer_reviews.text: I really expected this to remove some stains and at least give my old boat a little shine but alas, i was really disappointed. She looks better after just a soap and water wash down.
customer_reviews.author: downrightp

customer_reviews.title: Must have necessity's for a day on the lake
customer_reviews.text: Interior smells and cleans great definitely a must have while out on the lake from water spots to mud tracked in by poorly rinsed feet it takes care of it. Exterior cleans really good too a second wipe is a must and it is a little harsh on the nose but most good cleaners are but i must say after 5 days on a dirty lake my boat was shinning great after whiping it with the bj exterior deffinately beats washing everytime with less mess
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juicer for life!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and smells great. Let juice at home, pulled boat or off water and took to storage without wiping down. Few weeks later brought boat home and used Boat Juice...wow!!! Water spots came off so easy.
customer_reviews.author: JBrad

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product...Terrible Bottle/Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t suggest this product to anyone. The juice itself works ok. It smells wonderful. The problem is I have now received 4 bottles and all of them have either been cracked or after a couple uses the sprayer is defective so it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald VanderZouwen

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a boat and this was recommended to us as a great cleaner. I would agree its a great product and I would highly recommend this to anyone with a boat. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sfpier39

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Really like this stuff. For inside and outside the boat. A little bit goes a long way. I will continue to buy. Thanks for a great product for the outside of the boat and inside. They also send great cloths to use. Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is fantastic! A lasting tropical scent, keeps my garage smelling great. Product is super easy to use leaving my boat shiny and looking like new. They microfiber cloths are pure quality. Strange thing to say but they are. And let’s end this with incredible customer service! I had a bottle crack on be before I got the chance to use it and another one was in the mail within 15 min of me sending the email. Buy it, you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: travis larson

customer_reviews.title: Simply a 5 star product!
customer_reviews.text: My boat is a dark red with tan interior, boat juice is the 1st product I’ve gotten that finally takes the water spots out of the dark red exterior. As far as the interior, non greasy and safe to use around gauges, seats and bar top!! Definitely giving this product 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sean#17

customer_reviews.title: 1997 Ski Nautique and BOAT JUICE
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a 1997 Ski Nautique. We love the boat and being in the water. What we love even more is the easy clean up and protection we get from cleaning the hull and interior with Boat juice exterior and interior cleaner. Easy spray on, wipe dry application, right after we pull the boat from the water keeps the boat graphics, gel coat and interior looking fresh, clean and new! Highly recommend you use on your boat! Thanks BOAT JUICE, love the products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Boat juice is where its at! I ordered some a while back and loved it! I ran out and needed something so I tried some other sauce and it was terrible. Smelled like vinegar and streaked. Had to order some more boat juice right away. This stuff smells awesome and works great. Leaves a nice layer of wax down and the interior spray protects and cleans my vinyl. Very happy with boat juice cleaners. I will never go without again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Showroom quality results for us!
customer_reviews.text: Looks showroom quality... that is what was said after seeing our black boat completely shined up inside and out. Smells great and works great for us so far. A little goes a long way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! We had a ton of overspray from sun screen that had gotten all over the inside of our boat. This subsequently caused it to look dirty and grimy. The outside (Black in color) had constant water spots that persisted even after wiping it down with soap and water. This stuff is now my go to cleaner for the entire boat. Can’t recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson Cain

customer_reviews.title: Works Great & Has a nice Smell
customer_reviews.text: This boat juice works great to clean the inside and outside of our boat. It has a nice, tropical smell to it which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: JulesValenz99

customer_reviews.title: Best boat cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! We have 3 kids, and they always love to bring friends with them when we go boating. Kids get hungry , always want to eat something.... cheetos and the cheeto dust.. was all over the foam flooring, ground in. The interior cleaner got it right out. Love that stuff..
customer_reviews.author: Lorelee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well on my boat
customer_reviews.text: This product did not remove the spots on my pontoon boat. It looks the same as before using the product. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use and has a nice shine. They were a little slow to ship (took about a week).
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, i'm using it on a new fiberglass fishing boat. It buffs out so nicely with the second cloth and really leaves a beautiful clean shine with no residue. On top of all that the coconut scent lasts a long time, a week after cleaning up the boat it still smells like a tropical island!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed the boat down this evening. It’s been sitting for 3 days after the lake. Pretty dirty and water spotted. Boat juice sprayed on easy and took water spots right off. High gloss finish. Easy to use. I will try interior spray later and we will see how it is. If it’s anything like the exterior, it’ll be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Good for in between boat washings
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. We’ve been using it a lot in between boat washings. Love the vinyl cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Product couldn’t be easier to apply. I have a brand new boat and I apply boat juice every other time I clean the boat. I especially like it for protecting my motor cowling in between waxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MEH = Nice Rags though
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, used on my fishing boat, cleaned the motor up nice but had really no affect on the body of my boat that I couldnt have gotten with soap and water. Didnt remove water spots on the boat body. DISCLAIMER: I have not used the interior bottle yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Do many products to choose from. Boat juice nailed it! First with the name, the scents and works amazingly well! We live in kansas and LOTS of dirty water. Boat juice gets rid of the hard water spots with no problem. I have already ordered more!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa goldston

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Water doesn’t bead and boat isn’t slick to the touch. Did little to improve shine. Will not use again
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Products!
customer_reviews.text: The exterior cleaner smells great, goes on easy and takes off water spots with little effort! I had been using a water and vinegar mixture which did ok, but the Boat Juice will now be my product of choice for both my boat and my jet-ski.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product I tell other boaters to also buy them
customer_reviews.text: Your boat juice product was recommended by another boater so I purchased it and the results from the interior juice cleaned all the seats and floor better then the products we were using previously with a great scent and appears to leave a protective coating The exterior product also did this great cleaning job too
customer_reviews.author: Doug Luckhardt

customer_reviews.title: I love my Juice
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new Lowe fishing boat (Black) and had problems keeping the water spots under control. I ordered my juice and now all we do is wipe it down and it looks like it just came off of the show room floor
customer_reviews.author: Debra M DeSelms

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the interior stuff, it will stiffen your vinyl.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy the vinyl interior product. The exterior product seems decent, but the interior vinyl product seems to have stiffened the vinyl in my boat. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Liked the product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product to use after using my boat and storing - Quick and easy - will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Boat Juice works great!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many competitors products Boat Juice does what it's supposed to do and with a very pleasant scent! I am very impressed with their products and shall spread the word enthusiastically!
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, the perfect cleaning solution for picky boat owners does exist!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! Plus the towels are extremely plush and made of great quality. I used a little bit on the interior and it made a big difference. Plus my boat smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Did a decent job at cleaning the vinyl seats on both my boats. Smells really good too
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Koda

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product first time user
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that Not only cleans the water spots but Provides a protective coating on the boat similar to a wax
customer_reviews.author: Darren Rak

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the boat looking like new!
customer_reviews.text: Just used the exterior, and interior cleaner on my 24’ Yamaha, and my boat is shining! The exterior cleaner cleaned up all the water spots, and the interior cleaner made my seats look like new! Plus the boat smells great now. I used about an 1/8 of each bottle to clean the whole boat.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great seat and slippery shines outside good
customer_reviews.text: Works good used on 27ft fountain u don't need much little goes long ways
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Make your boat shine!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a product that was easy to apply and would make the boat shine. Boat Juice did both. And it smells great to boot!
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMyBabyGirl

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my boat sparkle like a expensive detail job all I can say is WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on the boat and waverunner! Doesn’t take much product to create a nice shine and to remove water spots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes cleaning the boat at the end of the season easier
customer_reviews.text: We used the hull cleaner for the pontoons on our boat. They came out looking like brand new! The apolster cleaner cleaned the apolstery well and we will see how well it keeps it clean through the winter when we take the cover off in the spring
customer_reviews.author: Lori G.

customer_reviews.title: Works OK .....not Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok but not great. It did a nice job of making it shiny but didn’t get all of the the lake grime off
customer_reviews.author: ray downey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my boat and jet ski.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter pack for cleaning up the boat during the summer use. No more gross vinegar smell like the other brand and the wax works great. The interior cleaner works great at removing dirt spots as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Gabbard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My son and I use this at the end of the day when cleaning up the boat. It does a fantastic job. The smell is awesome!. I just wish I had a second bottle so we could both work on the interior at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boat juice worked great
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great! It was very easy to apply. Got rid of water spots and left a nice shine on the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: at

customer_reviews.title: It just works! Few sprays, quick rub, and done!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a few products and the other 2x didn’t do the job. This took spots off that were constantly staying behind from the other cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorM

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The interior spray works really well removing mildew. The exterior didn't seem to work at first, but after 2 applications and then wiping it down you can see a huge difference. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but trigger is not usable
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works great but the delivery trigger does not work with the bottle. Trigger is way to long.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: My boat is black, therefore it shows water spots very easily. I spent the extra money and bought this product. This product is average at best. Needless to say that I will NOT buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wayne Speed

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff that actually smells good
customer_reviews.text: The micro fiber towels included are top notch. Easy to identify the interior to exterior. The cleaners worked very well without the nasty smell of vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Viramontes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cloths with the product. Does a great job, and doesn’t streak. Cleans well for touch ups and leaves no residue.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paul Webb

customer_reviews.title: Removes hard water spots!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean and polish our boat. It did a really good job of removing old hard water spots from the hull and especially off the stainless steel hardware that I haven’t been able to get off with any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Burmaster

customer_reviews.title: Does what was stated in their add
customer_reviews.text: Used both products on my boat. Both worked great on the interior and exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy application
customer_reviews.text: Very easy application with the spray bottles and towels. I was able to clean my boat very quickly as it sat in our lift. All of the dirt and bug spots came off our seats very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mangas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product from a great company
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I will definitely keep in my list to buy more. The included towels are amazing and you get alot of cleaner for the money. Will definitely do business again and again
customer_reviews.author: JASON BLOOMQUIST

customer_reviews.title: Boat Juice not only cleans, but puts a nice shine on your boat as well.
customer_reviews.text: My boat was dull and drab from lack of TLC, in addition to mold stains on the seats. Boat juice cleaned everything up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Water Spots Disappear!!! Works on chrome too!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used several water spot removers on our boat. But this is so easy! Spray on and wipe off! It even works on chrome trim. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!! And scent they use is added bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Have 2017 Supra SA, stuff worked great on any hard water spots and the smell both interior and exterior are amazing. Neighbor who went with me and helped wipe down boat afterwards said he’s ordering some too now.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great products that are super easy to use and the fact that they come with the microfiber towels makes everything even easier. Looking forward to cleaning the boat next weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Califano

customer_reviews.title: Shiny boat
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the results on the exterior. I used the interior as well on my Boat and in my vehicles. It shines and smells good!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Babbie

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this cleaner pack!!!!! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love these cleaners! We were recommended this from friends and we are so pleased with the products, they work very well. Definitely recommend using!

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Very pleased with the results. Arrived very fast.

customer_reviews.title: Made my boat look like new
customer_reviews.text: Made my boat look like new. Great product Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: stephen f sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Best boat and pwc cleaner on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great product for your boat and pwc! After just one use the stains on my white seating disappeared. Great smell and the microfiber wipes made the job a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Just Like New
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. My husband ordered and cleaned the boat. I was shocked as it looked brand new. The towels are amazing too !!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in. Tried it today and it’s quick and easy. Smells GREAT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these products! It’s so easy to use and our boat is always looking perfect! Also it smells amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, smells great. Takes a bit of effort to get heavier grime off.

customer_reviews.title: Makes the boat look newer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Conveniently comes with new color coordinated towels.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Especially when the boat is wet. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for something to get rid of those waterspots try this one!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff looks and smells great! The towels are very high quality!

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing unlike the competitors of boat juice. My boat looks and will continue to look brand new for years to come!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and smells great.. Been using 303 products but this is a much better product.

customer_reviews.title: Bling bling
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Smells good. My boat is really shiny. I use it every time I get off the water.

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy to receive this in the mail today and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy to receive this in the mail today and both bottles are leaking from the bottom. The interior box was soaking wet and the cloths that came with them are wet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean water line stains off my 94 regal valanti 202, worked as advertised great product, the interior stuff is amazing, cleans years of built up grim and suntan lotion, awesome stuff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Boat Juice Cleaner Kit - 32oz Exterior Cleaner - Ceramic SiO2 Sealant - Water Spot Remover & 32oz Interior Boat Vinyl Cleaner - Ceramic UV Protectant - Includes Interior and Exterior Microfiber Towels
product_meta.description:
The Boat Necessities Kit Contains Everything You Need to Keep Your Boat Looking Perfect!!!

At Boat Juice, we set out to create something better! No more horrible smelling, vinegar based marine cleaners or buckets of five products to get one job done! Cleaning your boat has never been easier and more satisfying!!

 * Boat Juice Exterior is designed to quickly and easily remove hard water spots from gelcoat, bright work and glass surfaces.
 * Boat Juice Exterior also has a proprietary blend of high grade polymer wax sealant that adds a glossy feel and protection to your watercraft.



Our results have shown that Boat Juice Exterior will out perform the competition and do it without the harsh chemical smell.

Boat Juice Exterior is the perfect product for:

 * Boats and Watercraft
 * Automobiles,
 * Motorcycles,
 * RV's
 * Stainless Steel kitchen appliances.



Easy to use!: Spray on – Wipe off. No rinsing necessary!




Boat Juice Interior safely cleans the surfaces inside your vessel and will lift stains and deodorize offensive smells on:

 * Upholstery
 * Vinyl
 * Plastic
 * Carpet
 * Foam flooring


Boat Juice Interior quickly penetrates to remove pollutants, oils, stains, food spills, mildew and ground-in dirt. Leaving behind UV protectant that does not feel oily or slick. Boat Juice Interior does all this while smelling like orange creamsicle.

Boat Juice Interior is the perfect product for:

 * Boats and Watercraft
 * Automobiles,
 * Motorcycles,
 * RV's



This is a product that will quickly become your go to when there is a spill in your boat.
feature_bullets: CLEAN AND PROTECT IN ONE STEP! - 32 Ounce Exterior contains a polymer wax sealant leaving your boat glossy and spot free. Use on a Wet or Dry Boat!
POWERFUL CLEANER - Removes mineral deposits and hard water spots easily.
EFFECIENT, EFFECTIVE AND SMELLS SO GOOD! - At Boat Juice, we set out to create something better! No more horrible smelling, vinegar based cleaners or buckets of five products to get one job done!
CLEAN YOUR BOAT INTERIOR EASIER! - 32 Ounce Interior is the perfect balance between cleaner, UV protectant, and deoderizer
SAFE TO USE ON INTERIOR SURFACES - Safe on upholstery, carpet, vinyl, plastic, and foam flooring
